explanation: [0-0] A hand holds a silver instrument with a dial against the rear camera lens of a grey iPhone, which is placed face down on a yellow wooden board on a dark blue platform. The background is blurred.
[0-3] Then, the hand presses hard on the rear camera lens with the instrument, the pointer on the instrument rotates accordingly, and the rear camera lens cracks.
[0-3] Then, the hand presses hard on the rear camera lens with the instrument, the pointer on the instrument rotates accordingly, and the rear camera lens cracks.

[3-8] Next, the hand uses black tweezers to remove the glass protective cover from the lens. Afterward, the phone lens is wiped with a dust-free cloth.

[8-15] Subsequently, the shot changes to a hand wiping the rear camera lens with a dust-free cloth. Then, a transparent phone lens protector is taken out, aligned with the phone lens, and applied. After applying it, the lens protector is wiped again with a dust-free cloth. Then, the upper part of the protector is removed.
